item.description:
Complete your free RSVP on: http://bit.ly/webinartime

----

As investors, beginners and seasoned, we have concerned and we have pre-set notions about different facet of investing.

In this webinar Dani Beit-Or will address the most common ones and explain how to bypass them.

Presentation style is interactive and encouraging questions.

This webianr will address investment aspects such as:

  • Mortgages and loan
  • Property managers and agents
  • Short term and long term investing
  • "When things go wrong"
  • And more

This webinar will help you put "things in perspective" when it comes for investing.

---

Complete your free RSVP on: http://bit.ly/webinartime

item.name: Most Common Misconceptions Investors Have (follow RSVP inst.)
